Program Overview The undergraduate program prepares students for careers in computer science by offering BA and BS degrees, combined BA/MS and BS/MS degrees, and a minor. Learn More Joint Bx/MS Programs The Computer Science Department offers three BA/MS and BS/MS degree options for research-oriented or professionally-oriented CS and non-CS majors.
